import React, {useContext, useEffect, useState} from "react"; import { catalog } from "../http/CatalogApi"; import { Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import {observer} from "mobx-react-lite"; import Header from "./Header"; import Logo from "../assets/logo1.png" import ImageBasket from "../assets/basket.png" import Search from "../assets/search.png" const Catalog =observer(() => { const [jest,setJest] = useState(false) var jest1 = useEffect(()=>{ console.log('что-то поменялось') }) const signIn = async () =>{ const response1234 = await catalog() setJest(!jest) console.log(jest) } return(
{/* Часть идущая после header, поиск и с корзиной */}

р. 0.00

{/* Часть каталога */}

}
); }) export default Catalog;
